name: FIGHT
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.

<Timed Attack: default>
<End Timed Attack>

description: Attempt to run from the battle.
name: Flee
Trap Skill
note:
<Use Undertale Attack>

<UTB Mode: 3>
<UTB Duration: 600>

<UTB Initial Code>
this._powerness = 30;
this._yDirection = 1;
</UTB Initial Code>

<UTB Code>
if(f === 1) {
  if(!$gameMessageBubble.hasSavedText()) {
    this.message("Prepare to die.");
  }
}
if(f <= 90) {
  this.window.x -= 2;
  this._player.x -= 2;
} else {
  this.window.x++;
  this._player.x++;
  this.window.y += this._yDirection;
  if(f % 60 === 0) this._yDirection = -this._yDirection;
}
if(f % this._powerness === 0 && f > 90) {
  var atk = this.createAttack(1);
  var random = Math.randomInt(3);
  if(random === 0) atk.y += 30 + 3;
  else if(random === 1) atk.y += 90 + 3;
  else if(random === 2) atk.y += 150 + 3;
}
</UTB Code>

============================================================

<UTB Attack 1>
Initial X: 0
Initial Y: this.window.y
Spawn Rate: -1
X Speed: 4
Y Speed: 0
Collision Type: Pixel
Image: Spider-Ani
Animation Frames: 2
Animation Speed: 4
</UTB Attack 1>

name: Phazer Claws
note:
<Use Undertale Attack>

<UTB Duration: 1500>

============================================================

<UTB Attack 1>
Initial X: Graphics.boxWidth
Initial Y: Graphics.boxHeight
Y Speed: 0
Type: Stop
Collision Type: Rect
Width: 48
Height: 48
Spawn Rate: 30
Opacity: 150
Image: Blue-Claw
Rotation: Math.PI * 5
<Initial Code>
this._tYPos = Math.randomInt(window.height) + 30;
</Initial Code>
<Direct Code>
if(frame < 40) {
  this.x -= ((Graphics.boxWidth - this.window.right - this.getWidth())/40);
  this.y -= ((this._tYPos)/20);
  this.rotation -= ((Math.PI * 5)/40)
} else if(frame > 50) {
  if(frame === 51) this.playSe("Wind7");
  this.x -= 6;
}
</Direct Code>
</UTB Attack 1>

name: Ball Throwing
note:
<Use Undertale Attack>

<UTB Duration: 250>
<UTB Mode: 1>

<UTB Code>
if(f === 50) {
  var a = this.createAttack(1);
  a.x = this.window.x;
  a.y = this.window.bottom;
  a.xspeed = 5;
} else if(f === 120) {
  var a = this.createAttack(1);
  a.x = this.window.x;
  a.y = this.window.y;
  a.yspeed = 5;
} else if(f === 190) {
  var a = this.createAttack(1);
  a.x = this.window.right;
  a.y = this.window.y;
  a.yspeed = 5;
}
if(f === 100) {
  p.setMode(1.2);
  p.xspeed = -8;
} else if(f === 150) {
  p.setMode(1.3);
  p.xspeed = 8;
}
</UTB Code>

name: Oar Toss
note:
<Use Undertale Attack>

<UTB Mode: 3>
<UTB Duration: 1100>

============================================================

<UTB Attack 1>
Initial X: this.window.x + this.window.width + 50
Initial Y: this.window.y + (this.window.height/2)
Y Speed: 0
Type: Stop
Collision Type: Rect
Width: 48
Height: 250
Spawn Rate: 120
Opacity: 180
Image: Big-Blue-Oar
X Scale: 0
Y Scale: 0
<Direct Code>
if(frame < 90) {
  this.scale.x += (1/90);
  this.scale.y += (1/90);
} else if(frame > 70) {
  if(frame === 71) this.playSe("Miss");
  this.x -= 10;
}
</Direct Code>
</UTB Attack 1>

<UTB Attack 2>
Initial X: this.window.x - 50
Initial Y: 0
Y Speed: 0
Collision Type: Rect
Width: 48
Height: 100
Spawn Rate: 30
X Scale: 0
Y Scale: 0
Image: Oar
<Initial Code>
var random = Math.random();
if(random < 0.3) {
  this.y = window.y + (window.height*(1/4));
} else if(random < 0.6) {
  this.y = window.y + (window.height*(1/2));
} else {
  this.y = window.y + (window.height*(3/4));
}
</Initial Code>
<Direct Code>
if(frame < 60) {
  this.scale.x += (1/60);
  this.scale.y += (1/60);
} else if(frame > 70) {
  if(frame === 71) this.playSe("Miss");
  this.x += 12;
}
</Direct Code>
</UTB Attack 2>

<Use Undertale Attack>

<UTB Duration: 600>

<UTB Initial Code>
	this.createAttack(1);
</UTB Initial Code>

<UTB Code>
console.log(f);
if ( f % 60 === 0 )
{
	this.createAttack(2);
}
if ( f % 90 === 0 )
{
	this.createAttack(1);
}
</UTB Code>
